subject: Critical: VPN Authentication Failure - AUTH_TIMEOUT preventing remote access
body: User cannot establish VPN connection from remote location since 08:30 AM EST. Consistent AUTH_TIMEOUT errors occurring during authentication phase. User has attempted: restarting VPN client (Cisco AnyConnect 4.10), rebooting workstation, and switching networks. Last successful connection was yesterday at 17:45. This is blocking access to critical financial systems for quarterly reporting.
